availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joab Clark (Clerk of Christian Circuit Court)

body.p: Clark was a farmer in Christian County who was a respected preacher. He married Nancy Brasher on December 18, 1853. Clark later served as the clerk of Christian Circuit Court.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “Joab Clark (July 23, 1807-January 23, 1882),” Memorial #11165520, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=11165520 (accessed June 3, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Christian, not stated, p. 315; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records ñ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Christian County Marriages, p. 2-3.
